about_the_game:
"

Loot Found on the Dungeon Floor


In the heart of an ancient, enchanted forest, bathed in the soft, dappled light filtering through the dense canopy of leaves, a lone ranger dons the renowned dag armor, blending seamlessly with the verdant tapestry of nature. Each step is a silent, deliberate movement that speaks of a profound connection with the wild, a testament to their unparalleled mastery of the wilderness.


In the moonlit confines of a secluded pirate cove, a daring swashbuckler, bedecked in the legendary swashbuckler's vestments, strikes a mesmerizing figure, embodying the essence of high-seas adventure and unparalleled daring.


In the heart of a pristine, ancient forest, where towering trees stand as sentinels of nature's grace, a noble knight donned in gleaming armor wields an emerald sword. Every step taken is a pledge to protect the sacred groves and the mystical creatures that call this realm home, and every swing of the blade is a testament to their unwavering dedication to the wild.



Loot Found on the Dungeon Floor is a comprehensive supplement for 5th Edition, featuring 200 meticulously designed magic items that promise to add depth and excitement to your campaigns. From legendary relics to unique trinkets, it offers a wide range of enchanting options for Dungeon Masters and players, elevating your storytelling and gameplay. Uncover the hidden treasures of forgotten realms, and let these magical items guide your path toward extraordinary adventures and legendary quests.


Inside the module, you will find:

  • 21 pieces of armor
  • 18 consumables
  • 6 complete item sets (containing 25 items)
  • 3 rings
  • 5 rods
  • 11 staves
  • 9 wands
  • 36 weapons
  • 72 wondrous items
"
